# setOpacity(_:at:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the opacity value at a specific time within the time range of the instruction.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func setOpacity(_ opacity: Float, at time: CMTime)
```

## Configuring the opacity

- **addOpacityRamp(_:)**: Sets an opacity ramp to apply during a specified time range.
- **opacityRamp(at:)**: Obtains the opacity ramp that includes a specified time.
